title: Riya is twice as old as Priya now. Three years ago, she was thrice as old as Priya. How old is Riya now? - Quora

response.answer_text: Consider the present ages of riya and priya are x and y respectively ,then from statement 1 we have riya age is twice of priya so x=2y → equation 1 from statement 2 we have three years ago which means when priya is y-3 and riya is x-3 , riya age is thrice of priya so (x-3)=3(y-3) by solving it we have x=3y-6 → equation 2 substitute x=2y from equation 1 in equation 2 hence 2y=3y-6 y=6 From our assumption y is priya’s age So Priya age is 6 Then present Riya Age becomes double that of Priya’s present age 2*age of priya = 2*6=12 Present age of Riya is 12 Thanks Gandhi for the correction :-) Murali :-)

Let the present age of Priya is X years, then Riya’s age will be 2X years. 3 years ago, Priya's age = (x-3) & Riya's age = (2x-3) . 3 years ago, Riya was thrice as old as Priya. So if Priya was (x-3) then Riya was 3(x-3). 3(x-3) =2x-3 3x-9=2x-3 3x-2x=9–3 x=6 Priya's age is x=6 years. Riya's age is 2x = 2*6 = 12 years.
